history.proof: intros s d a pl c tl H1 H2. srun best use: union_s1d_3 unfold: union_s_prd1.

original: intros s d a pl c tl H1 H2. unfold union_mpl_0. destruct s. - simpl in H2. auto. - simpl. destruct (N.eqb c a) eqn:Eq. + rewrite <- e. rewrite <- e in H2. apply H2. + apply mpl_compat_7 in H1. apply union_s_prd1 with (s:=s) (c:=c) (tl:=tl) in H2. apply H2. apply H1. apply Eq. apply n.
